oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A game played with the Phyllomorpha paradoxa or 'Withered Leaf' Insect. By /han=kasso (L VIII.-9. 6775-6785). The withered-leaf insect distracts crying children and the people protect it from burning in the fire and laugh at its head-nodding movements.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Phyllomorpha paradoxa The (or withered-leaf insect)
